content: The neural interface is now predicting ethical dilemmas with a 70% accuracy rate. It's not perfect, but it's a start towards an AI that can self-regulate its influence on human decision-making.
The patent lawyer called with some good news. Our blockchain integration approach is novel enough to warrant a patent. It's a big win for the integrity of our trading platform.

Our AI-human intuition experiment is revealing some surprising insights. We're finding that the AI can sometimes overrule human intuition in ways that aren't always ethical. We're learning how to balance the two.

Just had a breakthrough in our office design project. The AI's now optimizing for not just productivity but also for the ethical treatment of our team. It's like our office is now a living example of our values.
